pages.text: Electromagnetic Coils are part of the $(l:multiblocks/turbine)Industrial Turbine$(/l) multiblock.$(p)They convert the kinetic energy from the $(l:blocks/turbine/rotational_complex)Rotational Complex$(/l) into usable power. Therefore, they are a necessity for every $(l:multiblocks/turbine)Industrial Turbine$(/l), and some $(l:multiblocks/turbine)Industrial Turbines$(/l) may require more than one to suffice.
Each Electromagnetic Coil can handle four blades, so you shouldn't need more than 7 electromagnetic coils since 28 blades is the limit
